property.name: insertLineageTreeEdgeQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.lineage_tree_edge ( lineage_tree_edge_id, lineage_tree_id, node_from, node_to, attributes, type_of_interaction ) VALUES ( :LINEAGE_TREE_EDGE_ID, :LINEAGE_TREE_ID, :NODE_FROM, :NODE_TO, :ATTRIBUTES, :TYPE_OF_INTERACTION )

property.name: loadLineageTreeEdgesQuery
property.value: SELECT lineage_tree_edge_id, lineage_tree_id, node_from, node_to, attributes, type_of_interaction FROM catgenome.lineage_tree_edge WHERE lineage_tree_id = ?

property.name: loadLineageTreeEdgesByIdQuery
property.value: with recursive sub_tree( lineage_tree_edge_id, lineage_tree_id, node_from, node_to, attributes, type_of_interaction, level ) as ( SELECT lineage_tree_edge_id, lineage_tree_id, node_from, node_to, attributes, type_of_interaction, 1 FROM catgenome.lineage_tree_edge WHERE node_from = %s union all SELECT tree.lineage_tree_edge_id, tree.lineage_tree_id, tree.node_from, tree.node_to, tree.attributes, tree.type_of_interaction, level + 1 FROM catgenome.lineage_tree_edge tree join sub_tree st on tree.node_from = st.node_to ) SELECT lineage_tree_edge_id, lineage_tree_id, node_from, node_to, attributes, type_of_interaction FROM sub_tree
